report.name: PPCM_LISTEXT

reportHtmlEscapes.beforeReportHtmlEscape: <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"> <html dir=&Direction> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=&Encoding"> </head> <body bgcolor="#ffffff">

dataSource.name: Q_GROUPE
dataSource.select:
-- cas 1 -- ressource avec une situation en cours
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv forf',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout, to_char(sit.montant_mensuel,'FM9999999999D00') montant_mensuel, to_char(sit.ident) ident, sit.prestation prestation, sit.soccode societe, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy')) fincontrat, to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymmdd') fin, trim(lc.numcont) ||'-' || trim(lc.cav) numcontrat, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lcbis.lccouact,'FM999999999D00')) cout_futur, to_char(lcbis.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy') contrat_futur, st.gnom responsable, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',to_date('31/12/2099','DD/MM/YYYY'),lc.lresfin) tri_chrono, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.cpident chef_projet, sit.fident lien_forf, tr.rlib from ligne_cont lc,ligne_cont lcbis,situ_ress_full sit,ressource res,struct_info st, type_ress tr where sit.ident=res.ident and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and l.lresdeb < sysdate ) and lcbis.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and ( l.lresfin > sysdate or l.lresfin is null)) and lcbis.ident = res.ident and lc.ident(+) =sit.ident and sit.codsg=st.codsg and res.rtype = tr.rtype and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' &P_WHERE
--modif des regles de gestion
UNION
--cas 3 --pers ayant une situation en cours sans contrat
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv forf',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout, to_char(sit.montant_mensuel,'FM9999999999D00') montant_mensuel, to_char(sit.ident) ident, sit.prestation prestation, sit.soccode societe, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance, '' fincontrat_g, '' fin_g, '' numcontrat_g, '' cout_futur_g, '' contrat_futur_g, st.gnom responsable_g, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, to_date('31/12/2099','DD/MM/YYYY') tri_chrono_g, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.cpident chef_projet, sit.fident lien_forf, tr.rlib from ressource res,situ_ress_full sit,struct_info st, type_ress tr where sit.ident=res.ident -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' --and sit.ident NOT IN (select l.ident from ligne_cont l) --pas de contrat and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null )) and res.rtype = tr.rtype and sit.codsg=st.codsg and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' &P_WHERE
&P_ORDER;

dataSource.name: Q_POLE
dataSource.select:
-- cas 1 -- ressource avec une situation en cours
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv forf',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout, to_char(sit.montant_mensuel,'FM9999999999D00') montant_mensuel, to_char(sit.ident) ident, sit.prestation prestation, sit.soccode societe, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy')) fincontrat, to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymmdd') fin, trim(lc.numcont) ||'-' || trim(lc.cav) numcontrat, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lcbis.lccouact,'FM999999999D00')) cout_futur, to_char(lcbis.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy') contrat_futur, st.gnom responsable, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',to_date('31/12/2099','DD/MM/YYYY'),lc.lresfin) tri_chrono, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.cpident chef_projet, sit.fident lien_forf, tr.rlib from ligne_cont lc,ligne_cont lcbis,situ_ress_full sit,ressource res,struct_info st, type_ress tr where sit.ident=res.ident and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and l.lresdeb < sysdate ) and lcbis.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and ( l.lresfin > sysdate or l.lresfin is null)) and lcbis.ident = res.ident and lc.ident(+) =sit.ident and sit.codsg=st.codsg
and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' and res.rtype = tr.rtype &P_WHERE
--modif des regles de gestion
UNION
--cas 3 --pers ayant une situation en cours sans contrat
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv forf',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout, to_char(sit.montant_mensuel,'FM9999999999D00') montant_mensuel, to_char(sit.ident) ident, sit.prestation prestation, sit.soccode societe, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance, '' fincontrat_g, '' fin_g, '' numcontrat_g, '' cout_futur_g, '' contrat_futur_g, st.gnom responsable_g, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, to_date('31/12/2099','DD/MM/YYYY') tri_chrono_g, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.cpident chef_projet, sit.fident lien_forf, tr.rlib from ressource res,situ_ress_full sit,struct_info st, type_ress tr where sit.ident=res.ident -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' --and sit.ident NOT IN (select l.ident from ligne_cont l) --pas de contrat and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null ))
and sit.codsg=st.codsg and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' and res.rtype = tr.rtype &P_WHERE
&P_ORDER;

dataSource.name: Q_DEP
dataSource.select:
-- cas 1 -- ressource avec une situation en cours
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_dep(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,3)) libdep, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv forf',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout, to_char(sit.montant_mensuel,'FM9999999999D00') montant_mensuel, to_char(sit.ident) ident, sit.prestation prestation, sit.soccode societe, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy')) fincontrat, to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymmdd') fin, trim(lc.numcont) ||'-' || trim(lc.cav) numcontrat, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lcbis.lccouact,'FM999999999D00')) cout_futur, to_char(lcbis.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy') contrat_futur, st.gnom responsable, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',to_date('31/12/2099','DD/MM/YYYY'),lc.lresfin) tri_chrono, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.cpident chef_projet, sit.fident lien_forf, tr.rlib from ligne_cont lc,ligne_cont lcbis,situ_ress_full sit,ressource res,struct_info st, type_ress tr where sit.ident=res.ident and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and l.lresdeb < sysdate ) and lcbis.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and ( l.lresfin > sysdate or l.lresfin is null)) and lcbis.ident = res.ident and lc.ident(+) =sit.ident and sit.codsg=st.codsg
and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' and tr.rtype = res.rtype &P_WHERE
--modif des regles de gestion
UNION
--cas 3 --pers ayant une situation en cours sans contrat
select distinct pack_utile.f_get_dep(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,3)) libdep, to_char(pack_util_situ.DebutPresenceRessource(sit.ident),'dd/mm/yyyy') arriveesg, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv forf',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00')) cout, to_char(sit.montant_mensuel,'FM9999999999D00') montant_mensuel, to_char(sit.ident) ident, sit.prestation prestation, sit.soccode societe, to_char(sit.datsitu,'dd/mm/yyyy') datsitu, nvl(to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'En cours') echeance, '' fincontrat_g, '' fin_g, '' numcontrat_g, '' cout_futur_g, '' contrat_futur_g, st.gnom responsable_g, res.rtype type, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, to_date('31/12/2099','DD/MM/YYYY') tri_chrono_g, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.cpident chef_projet, sit.fident lien_forf, tr.rlib from ressource res,situ_ress_full sit,struct_info st, type_ress tr where sit.ident=res.ident -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' --and sit.ident NOT IN (select l.ident from ligne_cont l) --pas de contrat and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null )) and tr.rtype = res.rtype and sit.codsg=st.codsg and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' &P_WHERE
&P_ORDER;

<%@ taglib uri="/WEB-INF/lib/reports_tld.jar" prefix="rw" %> <%@ page language="java" import="java.io.*" errorPage="/rwerror.jsp" session="false" %> <%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=ISO-8859-1" %> <!-- <rw:report id="report"> <rw:objects id="objects"> </rw:objects> -->
